!Pet Manager Waters: Here, try this delicious new Wolf food. With this, even a Turek War Hound will go down in one bite! And here are Steel Teeth -- an expert Dwarven knife sharpener spent weeks making these! Ah, and see these new hatchling items! Look around -- a good pet owner always comes to the Dion Pet Center firs!
